for_birdeye_users: Frustrated with 12-month contracts? ReviewResponder is month-to-month.
Paying for features you don't use? We focus on one thing: AI review responses.
Not getting enough reviews? Our outreach system helps you get more.
Slow support? We respond within hours, not days.
for_high_volume_restaurants: Mit über 1000 Bewertungen ist es unmöglich, auf alle zu antworten - außer mit AI.
Jede unbeantwortete Bewertung ist eine verpasste Chance, Kunden zurückzugewinnen.
20 kostenlose AI-Antworten pro Monat - perfekt zum Testen.
for_unclaimed_yelp: Your Yelp page is unclaimed - customers are reviewing you but you can't respond.
Claim your page AND get AI-powered responses to save time.

next_steps: Follow-up in 3 Tagen wenn keine Antwort
